neighbors.name: Della Lu Brooks, Megan Lee Brooks & Morgan Marie Brooks
neighbors.claims: The Brooks family co-owns property on Alva Brooks Lane, a road named after their ancestor, Alva Brooks [The Free Lance-Star](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/fredericksburg/name/elnora-brooks-obituary?id=16415611). The family property contains a residential dwelling built circa 2011 on a lot exceeding 1 acre [Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/13328-Alva-Brooks-Ln-Spotsylvania-VA-22551/64536987_zpid/). Public records indicate the property is part of a legacy holding, with family members (such as Meagan) mentioned in local obituaries as long-time area residents [The Free Lance-Star](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/fredericksburg/name/elnora-brooks-obituary?id=16415611). No references were found of these specific Brooks family members speaking in local hearings or media about development issues [Virginia Mercury](https://virginiamercury.com/2019/02/27/hundreds-pack-into-contentious-spotsylvania-meeting-on-solar-project-supervisors-delay-decision/).
neighbors.influence_justification: Longtime local landowners with family road naming rights

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a respected community member acknowledge their familyâ€™s long local history and emphasize how any project plans respect their land legacy and continuity.

citations.claim: Alva Brooks Lane named after ancestor Alva Brooks
citations.title: Elnora Brooks Obituary - The Free Lance-Star

citations.claim: No public stance found in local hearings
citations.title: Spotsylvania Solar Hearing Coverage

neighbors.name: Anthony Gaudet & Brenda G. Gaudet
neighbors.claims: Anthony and Brenda G. Gaudet are the recorded owners of a 5.28-acre residential property at 8861 Pamunkey Road in Spotsylvania, which they acquired in 2017 [Homes.com](https://www.homes.com/property/8861-pamunkey-rd-spotsylvania-va/60fhqdebjy3w3/). The property features a 3-bedroom, 2-bath house built in 2000 [Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/8861-Pamunkey-Rd-Spotsylvania-VA-22551/64813243_zpid/). While there are records of Gaudet family members in Louisiana, definitive migration details for this specific couple could not be verified in the current scope; however, their ownership of the Spotsylvania property is confirmed via tax records [Homes.com](https://www.homes.com/property/8861-pamunkey-rd-spotsylvania-va/60fhqdebjy3w3/). They have not been identified in local news or meeting minutes as speaking out on development or energy projects [Virginia Mercury](https://virginiamercury.com/2019/02/27/hundreds-pack-into-contentious-spotsylvania-meeting-on-solar-project-supervisors-delay-decision/).
neighbors.influence_justification: Private residents; no public roles found

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Gaudets one-on-one with factual information, emphasizing that their rural peace and property value will be maintained. Personal outreach respecting their desire for a quiet environment is likely to resonate.

citations.claim: Owners of 5.28-acre property at 8861 Pamunkey Road
citations.title: 8861 Pamunkey Rd Property History

neighbors.name: Tammy Newton Pavey
neighbors.claims: Tammy Newton Pavey is associated with a residential parcel on Alva Brooks Lane in Spotsylvania, featuring a 1,256 sq ft home [Redfin](https://www.redfin.com/VA/Spotsylvania/5128-Ridge-Rd-22551/home/22886049). Local obituaries confirm she is part of the Newton family, long-time residents of Spotsylvania [Legacy.com](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/fredericksburg/name/donna-newton-obituary?id=12477439). While family members (Steve Pavey) have petitioned the county regarding utility infrastructure (broadband) [DHCD VA](https://www.dhcd.virginia.gov/sites/default/files/Docx/vati/archives/1-fiberlync-vati-application.pdf), there is no public record of Ms. Pavey herself taking a visible stance on local development or energy projects [Virginia Mercury](https://virginiamercury.com/2019/02/27/hundreds-pack-into-contentious-spotsylvania-meeting-on-solar-project-supervisors-delay-decision/).
neighbors.influence_justification: Local resident; family has engaged on utility issues

approach_recommendations.engage: Connect with Ms. Pavey through a neighborly conversation, acknowledging her family's tenure in the community. Emphasize that plans will not disrupt the quiet character of the area.

citations.claim: Associated with 1,256 sq ft home on Alva Brooks Lane
citations.title: Redfin Property Details (13321 Alva Brooks Ln)
